simple.net
Class Uri

java.lang.Object
  simple.net.Uri

public final class Uri
extends java.lang.Object

More accurately parses the parts of a URI. This will even parse partial URI's with no problem.
The example URIs that will be used:
http://train.rail.com/georgia/augusta.php?id=1654#schedule
urn:isbn:0-395-36341-1

Created: Nov 5, 2010

Author:
Kenneth Pierce

Method Detail

trimFragment

public final java.lang.String trimFragment()
Trims the fragment off the URI. Useful for keeping a list of pages already read. Query is kept since this can affect the page's content.

Returns:
The URI minus the fragment.

trimTrailing

public final java.lang.String trimTrailing()
Trims the fragment and query off the URI. Useful for keeping a list of pages already read where the query has no effect.

Returns:
The URI minus the fragment.
